ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to run install.yml playbook due to below error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ###Below is the error while attempting run the command 'ansible-playbook -i inventory install.yml' ERROR! no action detected in task. This often indicates a misspelled module name, or incorrect module path. The error appears to have been in '/app1/setup/awx/installer/roles/local_docker/tasks/compose.yml': line 27, column 7, but may be elsewhere in the file depending on the exact syntax problem. The offending line appears to be: - block: - name: Start the containers ^ here
